text: <|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> Jong AZ heeft een opmerkelijke prestatie neergezet in de @1e_Divisie. Ze zijn het eerste team sinds RBC Roosendaal in mei 1997 dat een wedstrijd met minstens vijf doelpunten verschil verliest, nadat ze hun vorige wedstrijd met minstens vijf doelpunten verschil wonnen.<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|> 5 - Jong AZ are the first side to lose an @1e_Divisie match by a margin of at least five goals after winning their previous game by a margin of at least five goals since RBC Roosendaal in May 1997. Yo-yo.<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> Jorrel Hato has made history for the Dutch national team, known as @OnsOranje, by becoming one of the youngest players to start a match this century. At just 18 years and 221 days old, Hato is the third-youngest starter for the Netherlands since 2000. Only two players have beaten this record: Matthijs de Ligt, who was a mere 17 years and 225 days old at his first start, and Jetro Willems, who was 18 years and 57 days old. This early start for Hato signals a promising future for the young talent.<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|> 18 - Only Matthijs de Ligt (17 year and 225 days) and Jetro Willems (18 years, 57 days) were younger at their first start for @OnsOranje this century than Jorrel Hato (18 years, 221 days). Opportunity.<|eot_id|>

Perilous.<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> Hugo Bueno heeft een vliegende start gemaakt bij @Feyenoord. In zijn Eredivisie-debuut gaf hij al na vier minuten een assist. Dit is de op één na snelste assist voor een debutant bij Feyenoord deze eeuw, alleen overtroffen door Cyriel Dessers. Bueno's snelle entrada in de Nederlandse competitie belooft veel voor zijn toekomst bij de Rotterdamse club.<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|> 4 - Hugo Bueno provided an assist within four minutes after his Eredivisie debut, the second fastest for a @Feyenoord player this century (after Cyriel Dessers). Entrada.<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> FC Volendam's (@fcvolendam) striker Henk Veerman is on a remarkable scoring streak in away matches. He has found the back of the net in seven consecutive Eerste Divisie (@1e_Divisie) away games, a feat that hasn't been achieved in over a decade. The last player to match this impressive run was Jeremy Bokila, who scored in seven straight away games for Sparta Rotterdam between October 2011 and March 2012.<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|> 7 - @fcvolendam's Henk Veerman is the first player to find the net in seven consecutive @1e_Divisie away games since Jeremy Bokila for Sparta Rotterdam in October 2011-March 2012 (7). Skipper.<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> @AFCAjax heeft een indrukwekkende reeks neergezet tegen Poolse tegenstanders in Europese competities. Ze zijn al zes wedstrijden op rij ongeslagen (W5 D1) en hielden in vijf van die wedstrijden de nul. Met 14 gescoorde doelpunten tegenover slechts 1 tegendoelpunt, lijken de Amsterdammers de favorieten te zijn wanneer ze Poolse clubs treffen.<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|> 6 - @AFCAjax are unbeaten in each of their previous six European meetings with Polish sides (W5 D1), keeping a clean sheet in five of those matches (14 goals scored, 1 conceded). <|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> FC Twente are set for their third encounter with Red Bull Salzburg in European competition. <|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> FC Utrecht's (@fcutrecht) goalkeeper Vasilios Barkas has gained an unfortunate reputation in the Eredivisie (@eredivisie). Since the beginning of last season, Barkas has received more yellow cards for time-wasting than any other goalkeeper in the league, with a total of two cautions. This statistic highlights Barkas's tendency to slow down play, a tactic that has now put him in the spotlight for the wrong reasons.<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|> 2 - Since the start of last @eredivisie campaign, @fcutrecht's Vasilios Barkas received more in-match cards for time wasting than any other goalkeeper (2). <|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|> Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023 Write an Opta-style tweet about the following:<|eot_id|> <|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|> The 2024-25 Jupiler Pro League season kicked off with a whimper rather than a bang.
